title: Activate vRack Services
regionDescription: vRack Services is a regional service. You must therefore select which region you intend to use it in. To benefit from the Service Endpoint, you must select the region corresponding to your OVHcloud managed service.
modalDescriptionLine1: To create vRack Services, you need to create a vRack.
modalDescriptionLine2: Do you want to order a vRack when you create vRack Services?
modalNoVrackButtonLabel: No thanks, I already have a vRack
modalDescriptionLine4: You requested the creation of a vRack when you created the vRack Services.
modalDescriptionLine5: To finish creating the vRack Services, please accept the following terms and conditions.
